project_descr: This Enabling Activity project will assist Mexico to prepare its Sixth NC. The objective is to strengthen institutional capacity in integrating climate change national strategies into development priorities while fulfilling obligations to the UNFCCC

outputs.output_descr: This Enabling Activity project will assist Mexico to prepare its Sixth NC, including a Biennial Update Report (BUR) to the UNFCCC.
